Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Enjoy 20.88% savings at Esso, 20.8% savings at Shell fuel stations and 8% cashback at all other petrol stations.
Enjoy 8% cash back at all grocery stores and F&B outlets worldwide.
Cash rebates earned will not expire.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Maximum cash back of $25 per category (Petrol, Grocery, Dining) per month.
8% cash back on petrol, groceries and dining is awarded with a min. spend of $888/month.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Apply for 2 Citibank Credit Cards and receive approval within 30 days from date of application. 2. Charge a minimum of S$200 per month on either one of the cards for 6 consecutive months. 3. Receive a maximum of $20 cashback per month for 6 consecutive months.

Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 96.30 (First year fee waived for 2 cards)

Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 96.30 (First year fee waived for 2 cards)
Minimum Repayment1% of current a/c balance plus 1% outstanding amount plus late charges or S$50, whichever is higher.
